CustomField.description: SCOPES Maintance to utilize when an Account Request has been updated in SCOPES and/or Citi for the requested account changes. (i.e. Billing Address, Phone Number, SCOPES Account Created, etc.)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: SCOPES Maintance to utilize when an Account Request has been updated in SCOPES and/or Citi for the requested account changes. (i.e. Billing Address, Phone Number, SCOPES Account Created, etc.)
CustomField.label: Sync with SCOPES
